Text: No need to be sorry.  I also noticed that Lifetime was slow to place it on their site.  Many thanks for the U/L.  It is downloading as I type.  Thanks !!

Thanks for the UL!! I did notice Lifetime & my OnDemand provider have been taking at least 1-2 extra days after it airs for the first time to put it up on those 2 places as the season goes on. The first ep (and the 2nd *I think* were up that very night right after midnight) 

Thanks so much for taking the time to do this!!! I can not believe The Scene has not caught on to the popularity of this show yet!!

The Scene has caught on, they did most of season one then they just stopped. Not sure why but meantime I figured I'd fill the gap.

Not sure what's up with lifetime either, normally eps go up the next day, but lately it's taking a few days
